Question: Why should I choose Genie services?
Answer: WMG Genie services can help you find the right vendor that fits your budget & style! Our Genie expert saves you the time & hassle of browsing through hundreds of profiles by suggesting only the most relevant vendors after hearing your requirements. Moreover, Event Ease has best price guarantees for some of its vendor partners and you can avail of this through the Genie service.

Question: Do I have to pay for this service?
Answer: Get WMG Discovery Assistance service at INR 400 for single category. For multiple categories, you can avail our package at a nominal rate of INR 750 which includes booking assistance for 3 categories. For a complete planning assistance you can avail our WMG Planning Assistance package at INR 2500/-.

Question: How can I get the Best price for a vendor?
Answer: The WMG team has pre-negotiated Best Deals for some of our vendor partners. Once you shortlist some of your favourite vendors, you can reach to your assigned Genie expert and they can check back and tell you if the best deal is available for your chosen vendor.

Question: How do I make the payment for booking the vendor?
Answer: Once you have finalised on the amount & deliverables with your chosen vendor, you can simply pay an advance to the vendor directly as per their Payment terms.

Question: Can I get recommendations for other services as well?
Answer: Recommendations are available for Venues, Photographers, Makeup Artists, Mehendi Artists, Wedding Planners, Decorators, Sangeet Choreographers, DJ & Catering.

Question: Where will I see my recommendations?
Answer: Your recommendations will be visible to you on the Event Ease app https://www.Event Ease.com/download-app/ as well as on email . We recommend you download the Event Ease app to keep updated through the various steps.
